Articles.Content:
Your High Quality Spacecraft Shop!

Logo Fix Soon

Our Spacecraft:

Duna I Popgun Meteorology System

{PICTURES SOON}

Mission Details

  • Make Meteorological Surveys
  • Photograph Kerbin Surface
  • Test New Technologies

Crew Capacity: 1

Mod Requirements: Zyoxygen, Electric Power

Simple Flight Tutorial:

  1. Countdown
  2. Turn on SAS
  3. Liftoff, vertical ascent until Solid Booster runs out.
  4. When liquid engine ignites, burn slightly on an angle in desired direction.
  5. When out of fuel, turn into a retrograde position.
  6. When over apoapsis, press space to initiate 5-second retroburn.
  7. Wait until desired altitude to deploy parachute.

DOWNLOAD: [ATTACH]34375[/ATTACH]

Feedback is allways appreciated!
